attributes.action: ban the payment of ful-time councillors, ensure on volounteers serve as previously
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Some Councillors are now highly paid individuals. We, the council tax payers, have to pay their wages for what was previously done by volounteers. These were people who were passionate about doing the right thing for the people and the area. They were genuinely answerable to the voters and did not shrug us off as not understanding or not knowing
